entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
